acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.curvePools: List of Curve pool addresses; use address(0) to remove support

params.collateralToken: Address of the token to leverage
params.userCollateralAmount: Amount of collateral provided by the user

onFlashLoan(address,address,uint256,uint.details: Decodes leverage intent, swaps stblUSD to collateral, opens a leveraged position, and repays loan.

returns._0: bytes32 Confirmation of successful flash loan callback

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

addSupportedCollateralTokens(address[],a.notice: Add or remove supported collateral tokens and their Curve pools

leverage(address,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Public function to initiate a flash loan and create leverage position

onFlashLoan(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Callback function called by the stblUSD lender during a flash loan

renounceOwnership().notice: Disabled renounceOwnership for upgradeability and admin control
